description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Adam Tornhill - Founder and CTO at Empear AB

ABSTRACT
To understand large software systems we need to look beyond the current structure of the code. We need to understand both how the system evolves and how the people building it collaborate. In this session you'll learn to mine social information such as communication paths [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Embrace%20the%20Past:%20How%20Software%20Evolution%20Lets%20You%20Understand%20Large%20Codebases

https://twitter.com/gotoamst
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: Embrace the Past: How SW Evolution Lets You Understand Large Codebases
